data.actual_result: Part of the profile picture shows up to the right of the user's name
data.expected_result: You see part of the profile picture and the name only
data.short_description: Extra profile picture in mutual friends tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the profile of someone you have multiple mutual friends with (i'd say 8 or more so that you can scroll) - Make sure the bottom user is slightly visible (where you can see part of the profile picture) - Observe to the right of the user's name
